title: Lyon-Juve 'was match zero'

content:
A report in today’s L’Equipe claims Olympique Lyonnais-Juventus might have played an important role in the spread of coronavirus in France.
According to a retired doctor based in Lyon, the Champions League Last-16 tie between the two teams at Groupama Stadiu… [+1342 chars]
